attributes.action: say no to releasing medical records. outside NHS
attributes.additional_details:
The Prime Ministers suggestion that the NHS should release the nations medical records, to the private sector
should not be allowed. As this could be the first step back to a pre NHS, health system. We are already losing many hospitals. recently rebuilt in partnership with outside founding. Some of these hospitals now cannot afford the repayments. I see all these actions as privatisation of the best health service in the world.
